body:
Greetings!

I am making this thread to alert the community of an upcoming map testing event! A map testing event will be held on Saturday 14, 2015 at 1PM EST All players are free to hop onto /server mapdev and test out a whole bunch of new maps. The mapdev server will only become open at this time and date. 


This is a complete list of what will be tested during this event. If you feel the map developers have missed something, feel free to say so.
body_tagged:

This is a complete list of what will be tested during this event. If you feel the map developers have missed something, feel free to say so.
title: Map Testing Announcement.

replies.body:
The map list has been updated based on what you guys said, hopefully it will answer some questions

@Awesomerp - It ends when we have tested each map there. You may send the YML in at the last minute, and it will appear for testing. 

@Burdie - Yes, you may.
replies.body_tagged:
The map list has been updated based on what you guys said, hopefully it will answer some questions

@Awesomerp - It ends when we have tested each map there. You may send the YML in at the last minute, and it will appear for testing. 

@Burdie - Yes, you may.
